result.adr_address: Stepana Bandery Ave, 34В, Kyiv, Ukraine, 04073
result.name: Mr. Grill Hotdogs & Burgers

reviews.text:
It took more than 30 minutes to sell the order, despite the fact that, due to the indignation of other people at the neighboring tables, some were waiting longer. You can only come here to look at the world of little people, at our future.

But the hot dog here is really tasty.

Many people write that you can’t get in without children, but you can if you know how to talk to people and say that you want to eat there and they’ll let you in

When we ordered hot dogs, it was great. BUT ! When I brought friends, we waited for half an hour, in the end hot dogs arrived with a stale bun, and then mashed potatoes, comparable in density to plasticine. Everyone on Instagram laughed, but not for long. We have two damaged bodies, I don’t recommend bringing children here, nor friends. I hope someone from the san station reads this. Take care of your stomachs.

"Hidden extortion or chipped-in business ideas?"
I recently read a lot of good reviews about an establishment with excellent (according to those who visited it) cuisine.
Sunday. My pregnant wife and I went on a long journey from the suburbs straight to Blockbuster. It would have been weird to travel that far just for hot dogs... but that's how it was. Still, for entertainment, a movie was chosen to watch...the movie turned out to be so-so, not for everyone. But that’s not the point. How are things going at the establishment? But there was no way... it was not possible for us to find out. At first, we spent a long time looking for the entrance to this mecca of hot dogs and hamburgers. Soon, we got pretty tired of all this and we decided to call the number on the website... an employee of the establishment answered, told us how to get there and immediately asked if we had children. When he heard that we don’t have children, he immediately said - AND THEN YOU WILL NOT COME TO US!!! How do you even understand this? I’m interested to know where you could get information that the entrance ticket to your Blockbuster establishment is the presence of a child???
You may ask, why does my review have such a strange title - “Hidden extortion or business ideas shared?” ... so here is my answer - yes, all because the cashier at KIDLandia (the children's entertainment complex through which you can go to Mr.Grill HOTDOGS & BURGERS) told us that if we want to get there, we will have to pay for a visit to KIDLandia !!! Explain to me, is this how a meeting of guests should be organized? What's next? Will you need to pay for the services of a cosmetologist? Dry cleaners? Perhaps you will need to pay for your order on credit and only in parts so that the interest accrues? Come to your senses!!! If you have 2 establishments, one of which has such a reputation, then the first one will simply suffocate... and you will become another example of how an excellent franchise merged when it came to Ukraine.

RESULT:
Wasted time and money on a taxi, spoiled mood. A big and ardent greeting to the owner.

Don’t go to this mess, you ordered pizza and a burger set, the pizza is terrible, ordinary pita bread on which they cut sausages and threw in regular cheese or a cheese product, the mozzarella cheese in the pizza does not smell like cheese, the burger set waited 40 minutes, despite the fact that people received their orders earlier than although we ordered later. The waiters brought the set without Pepsi, so I had to run behind the counter to get the drink myself. I'll never come here again. Table 45. Open 23/12 15:38:54. 12/23/2018.
!!!!! Thank you for the quick response to the complaint, it is clear that the management is not indifferent to what their guests say. They promised to look into it and take measures to ensure that no more visitors would end up in such a situation. I am changing from 1 star to 4 only because the management doesn’t care and they are ready to correct mistakes for their employees.

Disgusting!

1. The waiter constantly went somewhere for quite a long time, looked and spoke very tired.
2. We waited a long time for the order.
3. The food was of very poor quality, the rolls were too dry, the red sauce was just cheap tomato paste only slightly diluted, the cheese was very cheap or old, hard and plastic-tasting.

3.1 puree deserves special attention, absolutely wooden, tastes like the cheapest canteen.
Meat, i.e. the cutlet looked like a piece of coal, dry. It seemed that both the cutlet and mashed potatoes were prepared a couple of days ago.
There were no spices or napkins.
4. They didn’t give me a bib, which is part of this brand.

Overall, I'm very upset that I wasted my time and money. The establishment is absolutely disgusting.
